column1: # Monthly precipitation data; data were obtained for Fort Collins
column3: which is located about 56 miles southwest of the CPER site. Fort Collins' monthly precipitation totals (mm) for 1893-2009 were downloaded from the Western Regional Climate Center. Ideally
column4: we would want to use monthly precipitation from the study site (CPER)
column5: but this site did not provide complete monthly records for multiple years prior to the onset of the ANPP measurements.
